thread.title: INSIGHT: Thousands rally for Putin and Russian athletes

title: INSIGHT: Thousands rally for Putin and Russian athletes
text:
INSIGHT: Thousands rally for Putin and Russian athletes Saturday, February 03, 2018 - 00:47 
Several thousand Russians attended a patriotic rally and concert near the Kremlin on Saturday, to show their support for Vladimir Putin and Russian athletes heading to the Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang.   
Several thousand Russians attended a patriotic rally and concert near the Kremlin on Saturday, to show their support for Vladimir Putin and Russian athletes heading to the Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang.  //reut.rs/2nG2G7L
